entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$44.99 â†’ $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $44.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$8.99

Application Description

Having won over 160 awards and nominations including a BAFTA, Divinity: Original Sin 2 finally comes to Mac. Form a party and experience true branching gameplay with a story unique to each player, in a world filled with evil and abandoned by the gods. Your choices matter, so choose wisely, and know that only one of you can become the new Divine! Warning: before purchasing, please verify if your machine meets the requirements listed below. Features: - Play as one of 5 fantasy races, each with their own personalities and stories: Elves, Dwarves, Lizards, Humans, and the Undead. - Explore a vast world full of loot, treasures, upgrades, and stories with unprecedented branching narratives. - Turn-based combat featuring the elements of nature: combine fire, earth, water, air and everything in between to take down your enemies. - Talk to animals and ghosts to gain unique insights about the world and its secrets. - Up to 4 players online or 2 player split-screen coop. - Hold CMD when launching the game to access language and configuration options. Requirements: to check your Mac model, select "About This Mac" from the Apple menu in your menu bar. OS: - macOS 10.14.2 Mojave (or higher) recommended - macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra supported Supported hardware: - MacBook Pro: all since late 2016 - MacBook Air: all since mid 2017 - iMac: all since late 2014 with Radeon graphics, and all iMacs since mid 2017 - Mac Pro: all since 2019 - Mac mini: all since 2018 - eGPU: all official eGPU modules based on AMD GPUs HDR requirements: - macOS 10.14.2 or higher - Any iMac capable of 500Nits display that supports Automatic Brightness Adjustment.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Solo Mini Golf
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pack IVï¼š$1.99 â†’ $1.49 [$1.49 ~ $1.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.49

In-App Purchases

  • Pack IVï¼š$1.49
  • Pack Iï¼š$0.29
  • Pack IIï¼š$0.49
  • Pack IIIï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Immerse yourself in a world of solitary enjoyment as you navigate through beautifully crafted courses. Solo mini golf brings the classic game to your fingertips with easy to master controls. Pull the ball aim and release to take your shot with precision. Revel in the satisfaction of the perfect putts as you conquer rounds with obstacles, speed and many more. Â  Download solo mini golf now and discover the perfect blend of challenge, serenity and solo golfing fun.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
